name: Web3 Smart Contracts
author: miniOrange

sections.description:
Smart Contracts for Web3 plugin allows you to easily create Smart Contracts that can be deployed on any Network using Metamask.
Create DApps through Smart Contracts and take advantage of Blockchain security.

If you require any help with installing this plugin, please feel free to email us at web3@xecurify.com or Contact us.

Website

Check out our website for other plugins http://miniorange.com/plugins or click here to see all our listed WordPress plugins.
For more support or info email us at info@xecurify.com or Contact us.
sections.installation:
From WordPress.org

  1. Download miniOrange Web3 Smart Contracts plugin.
  2. Unzip and upload the Web3 Smart Contracts directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate Web3 Smart Contracts from your Plugins page.

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for Web3 Smart Contracts. Find and Install Web3 Smart Contracts.
  3. Activate the plugin from your Plugins page.

For any query/problem/request

Visit Help & FAQ section in the plugin OR email us at web3@xecurify.com or Contact us.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added Wallet Switching support

1.0.0

  • Added 1st release for Smart Contracts deployment
